examples:
QUERY (\x xs -> if length xs > 20 then xs else case inventorPatent x of Just patent -> (lastnam x, firstnam x, patentId(patent)):xs; Nothing -> xs)
FROM inventors
AS relational
TO relational
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> case x of (Just patent) -> if patentId patent < 3858258 then Vertex((patentId patent, patentCountry patent)) else empty; Nothing -> empty)
FROM patentGraph
AS graph
TO graph
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> case x of (Just patent) -> Vertex((patentId patent, patentCountry patent)); Nothing -> empty)
FROM patentGraph
AS graph
TO graph
RETURN all

LET t BE
QUERY (\x -> case x of (Just patent) -> if patentId patent == 3858249 then [(Just patent)] else []; Nothing -> [])
FROM patentGraph
AS graph
TO relational
RETURN all
IN
QUERY (\x -> if reachable x (t !! 0) patentGraph then Vertex x else empty)
FROM patentGraph
AS graph
TO graph
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> if reachable x (patents !? 3858249) patentGraph then Vertex x else empty)
FROM patentGraph
AS graph
TO graph
RETURN all
